thread.title: ABA honors Coleman with criminal justice award (Duke University School of Law)

author: wn.com
title: ABA honors Coleman with criminal justice award (Duke University School of Law)
text: ( Source : Duke University School of Law ) Professor James E. Coleman Jr. will be honored with the Raeder-Taslitz Award from the American Bar Association 's ( ABA ) Criminal Justice Section in October. The award recognizes a law professor whose
